description: Made certain parts a little easier to play.
title: The Soldier

description:
- By making the tab inaccurate I made it sound better (i.e. sliding from one note to another is apparently too much for GP5 to handle.)

- The bends are what they are. This file was converted from GP7 so some things get lost in translation. I have no idea what GP5 can do in terms of handling bends.
title: The Soldier

description: Guitar Pro 5 cannot handle multiple tempo changes within a song. The intro is supposed to be 75 bpm, then it goes up to 90 bpm when the acoustic guitar comes in before finally settling at 105 when the electric guitars come in. I've made everything 105 bpm.
title: The Soldier
